content:
```
EXISTING STRUCTURES
###Electricity generator at position(x)
Consists of steam engine(position x), boiler(position y) and offshore pump (position z)

###Iron plate mine at position(-14.0, -51.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position -14.0, -51.0)

###Iron smelting setup at position (4.0, -60.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace at position (4.0, -60.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (2.5, -59.5) that puts iron ore into the furnace
- Burner Inserter at position (5.5, -59.5) that extracts iron plates from the furnace and puts into chest at (4.5, -58.5)
- Iron chest at position (4.5, -58.5)
- Beltgroup that connects the furnace at position (4.0, -60.0) to the chest at position (4.5, -58.5)

###Iron plate transport setup
Consists of following entities
- Beltgroup (position ) that transports iron plates

###Iron plate chest at position(5.5, -2.5)
Consists of following entities
- Iron chest at position (5.5, -2.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (3.5, -2.5) that puts iron plates into the chest

###Copper furnace at position(-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace at position (-28.0, -61.0)

ERROR TIPS
-  Make sure to research the technology before attempting to craft items that require it.
- Ensure that the furnace has enough fuel and ore before waiting for it to smelt plates.

NAMESPACE
- No new functions have been defined.
```
